name: Flip Out!
description:
The government is out to get you, and they're sending their top federal alien ghost agents to claim your mind!  Swipe your screen to navigate the maze.  In portrait view, you see the walls.  In landscape view, you see the goal, items, and enemies.

Technologies used: 

ART

Adobe Photoshop CC

Adobe Photoshop CS6 (64bit)

Autodesk Sketchbook Pro (Android app)

A BRAND NEW Wacom Cintiq Companion Hybrid (32GB)

PROGRAMMING

NetBeans

Android SDK
